message:
Is this some kind of spam? I have never heard of any Amazon office in Alexandria!

another question, do recruiters send job offers arbitrarily on LinkedIn ??

data.message: I don't know about the Alexandria office, but man recruiters use LinkedIn to send job opportunities all the time!

I don't think that it's spam. Amazon Music is a division of Amazon. And yes, recruiters can hunt you down through you online presence (linkedin profile, blog posts, participation in online programming competitions, open source contributions etc).
bookdepository شركة انجليزية استحوزت عليها امازون وفعلا ليهم فرع ف اسكندرية
Go ahead and contact Jeff. He is not a fake. They will make you go through an interview before you get an offer. This is just an initial chat.
Give it a shot..  This is not spam..  Book depository  office is at Loran as far as I can remember
This is not a spam, They already have what is called  Amazon’s subsidiaries (in alex)

Jeff is a real amazon recruiter and they are in Egypt recruiting for their team.
The book depositary is an English company with an Alexandria office, acquired by amazon couple of years ago.

Usama Fayez Mahmoud Said Michel Aguib my point is that I'm still undergraduate and I have already stated that in my LinkedIn profile! yet the message states that the recruiter came across my profile and offers a "full time senior software engineer" position!! thats why I wonder if recruiters are sending job offers arbitrarily on LinkedIn. am I missing something here?!

Doesn't make much sense, Abanoub

It is a quick scan, but maybe he was lazy and scanned many profiles quickly (which is weird).. 

It won't harm to at least respond though

He'll then phone screen you and see if you are worth

He maybe missed the grad thing, he only looks up the skills section...
Anyway, I assure you he is the real deal, and this is an initial communication, no harm would be done in responding ...

Yeah he may have missed the graduation date ..
But this is not an offer yet, it's only an initial chat regarding a possible opportunity. Expect to receive such messages regularly on LinkedIn.
